column2: Formulate an ontology related to name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/name#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Name rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a name." .:FirstName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "First Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A person's given name." .:LastName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Last Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A person's family name or surname." .:FullName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Full Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A person's complete name, often including given name and family name." .:hasFirstName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FullName ;    rdfs:range :FirstName ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a first name." .:hasLastName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FullName ;    rdfs:range :LastName ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a last name." .:hasNickname rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has nickname" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to a nickname." .:AbbreviatedName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Abbreviated Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A shortened or contracted form of a name." .:hasAbbreviation rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :AbbreviatedName ;    rdfs:label "has abbreviation" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its abbreviated form." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Name rdf:type rdfs:Class ;      rdfs:label "Name" ;      rdfs:comment "A class representing a name, which is a personal label or designation." .:FirstName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;           rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;           rdfs:label "First Name" ;           rdfs:comment "A subclass of Name, representing a given name." .:LastName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;          rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;          rdfs:label "Last Name" ;          rdfs:comment "A subclass of Name, representing a family or surname." .:FullName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;          rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;          rdfs:label "Full Name" ;          rdfs:comment "A subclass of Name, representing the complete name of an individual, usually including both given names and family name." .:hasFirstName rdf:type rdf:Property ;              rdfs:domain :FullName ;              rdfs:range :FirstName ;              rdfs:label "has first name" ;              rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a first name." .:hasLastName rdf:type rdf:Property ;             rdfs:domain :FullName ;             rdfs:range :LastName ;             rdfs:label "has last name" ;             rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a last name." .:MiddleName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;            rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;            rdfs:label "Middle Name" ;            rdfs:comment "A subclass of Name, representing an additional given name(s) used between a first and last name." .:hasMiddleName rdf:type rdf:Property ;               rdfs:domain :FullName ;               rdfs:range :MiddleName ;               rdfs:label "has middle name" ;               rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a middle name." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: name.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Name a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a name, typically a personal name." .:hasFirstName a rdfs:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "Property representing the first name of a person." .:hasLastName a rdfs:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "Property representing the last name of a person." .:hasMiddleName a rdfs:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has middle name" ;    rdfs:comment "Property representing the middle name of a person, if any." .:FullName a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Full name" ;    rdfs:comment "A subclass for the full name, usually combining first, middle, and last names." .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Name rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A representation of a personal or organizational name." .:PersonName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Person Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A name associated with a human individual." .:OrganizationName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Organization Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A name associated with a corporate entity or organization." .:hasFirstName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :PersonName ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "The given or personal name of a person." .:hasLastName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :PersonName ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "The family or surname of a person." .:hasFullName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has full name" ;    rdfs:comment "The complete name representation." .:hasAlias rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has alias" ;    rdfs:comment "An alternative name or nickname." .:hasTitle rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :PersonName ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has title" ;    rdfs:comment "A formal title or honorific for a person." .:NameEntity rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name Entity" ;    rdfs:comment "An entity that possesses a name, such as a person or an organization." .:hasName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :NameEntity ;    rdfs:range :Name ;    rdfs:label "has name" ;    rdfs:comment "The name associated with an entity." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology/> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .ex:Name rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a name assigned to an entity." .ex:Person rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a person." .ex:hasName rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:Name ;    rdfs:label "has name" ;    rdfs:comment "A property linking a person to their name." .ex:FirstName rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Name ;    rdfs:label "First Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A given name or personal name of an individual." .ex:LastName rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Name ;    rdfs:label "Last Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A family name or surname of an individual." .ex:Alias rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Name ;    rdfs:label "Alias" ;    rdfs:comment "An alternative name used by or associated with a person." .ex:hasFirstName rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:FirstName ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "A property linking a person to their first name." .ex:hasLastName rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:LastName ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "A property linking a person to their last name." .ex:hasAlias rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:Alias ;    rdfs:label "has alias" ;    rdfs:comment "A property linking a person to an alias." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: name.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Name a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents a name, which could be a person's name, a place name, etc." .:hasFirstName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "Associates a name with a first name component." .:hasLastName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "Associates a name with a last name component." .:fullName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "full name" ;    rdfs:comment "Associates a name with the full name as a single string." .```

column2: Formulate an ontology related to name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/name#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Name rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a person's name." .:FirstName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "First Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the first name of a person." .:LastName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Last Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the last name of a person." .:FullName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Full Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the full name of a person, typically including first, middle, and last names." .:hasFirstName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FullName ;    rdfs:range :FirstName ;    rdfs:label "has first name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a first name." .:hasLastName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FullName ;    rdfs:range :LastName ;    rdfs:label "has last name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a last name." .:MiddleName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Name ;    rdfs:label "Middle Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the middle name of a person." .:hasMiddleName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FullName ;    rdfs:range :MiddleName ;    rdfs:label "has middle name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a full name to a middle name." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: name. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Name rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a name." .:hasGivenName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :GivenName ;    rdfs:label "has given name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its given name." .:hasFamilyName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :FamilyName ;    rdfs:label "has family name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its family name." .:GivenName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Given Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a given name." .:FamilyName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Family Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a family name." .:hasFullName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range :FullName ;    rdfs:label "has full name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a person to their full name." .:FullName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Full Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a full name." .:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a person." .:NamePrefix rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name Prefix" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a prefix in a name." .:hasNamePrefix rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :NamePrefix ;    rdfs:label "has name prefix" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its prefix." .:NameSuffix rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Name Suffix" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a suffix in a name." .:hasNameSuffix rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :NameSuffix ;    rdfs:label "has name suffix" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its suffix." .:hasMiddleName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Name ;    rdfs:range :MiddleName ;    rdfs:label "has middle name" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a name to its middle name." .:MiddleName rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Middle Name" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a middle name." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: name.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology#> .ex:Name a rdf:Class .ex:hasFirstName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ex:hasLastName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ex:hasMiddleName a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Name ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ex:isAliasOf a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Name ;    rdfs:range ex:Name .```
